name: Shimano IC3 Spin Cycling Shoes - Women's
description: This spin-optimized shoe combines the breathable upper and comfortable fit of a sneaker with the stability and pedalling efficiency of a cycling shoe. Powerful enough for intense trainer sessions and comfortable enough for the ride to the post-workout festivities.Breathable upper has a sock-like fit.BOA® L6 dial provide a custom fit and are easy to adjust on the fly.Cushioning EVA midsole for walking comfort.Half-length foot plate strikes a balance between pedalling efficiency and walkability.Women's-specific for a comfortable fit.
